laboratory_examinations.findings: Negative for toxigenic C. difficile by the Cepheid nucleic acid amplification assay. (Reference Range-Negative)

Dilatation of bowel loops up to 3.4 cm without significant stool burden. No significant air is recognized within the colon, raising the possibility of a small bowel obstruction. No free intraperitoneal air. Osseous structures are unremarkable. No unexplained soft tissue calcifications or radiopaque foreign bodies. Multiple phleboliths noted in the pelvis.
